name: Melon Man
description:
If HTML5 game is lagging, please use downloadable version.

This was made in under a week for the Explosive Jam 2021.

Warning: This is a rage game and it is super buggy, it may make you very angry. Play at your own risk.

You are the Melon Man. You deliver watermelons to the people of Melon City. You have a box full of melons that must be kept open for sunlight. But melons are fragile; If you drop a melon, it will explode!

Navigate through Melon City, avoiding obstacles and springing up to your destination: The delivery house. Deliver all the watermelons intact, or else..

This game was made for a game jam and it has many bugs, if you encounter a bug it is recommended to restart the level.
